author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Change the default of QGS and FTF transition for maximum energy for FTF. It was wrongly set in an earlier PR.

#### PR validation:

Standard runTheMatrix.py tested

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-sim70 Change the default of QGS and FTF transition for maximum energy for FTF
